DOC.brief_summary: Corneal biomechanics study glaucoma patient prior least 6 month trabeculectomy .
DOC.detailed_description: Prior trabeculectomy corneal biomechanics measure Ocular Response Analyzer ( ORA , Reichert ) Corvis st ( Oculus ) . Both instrument work air-puff deforms cornea . Intraocular pressure measure like non-contact air-puff tonometry . The ORA also measure corneal hysteresis ( CH ) corneal resistance factor ( CRF ) qualitative measure corneal biomechanics . The Corvis high-speed Scheimpflug-camera ( 4330 frames/sec ) record quantitative movement cornea . At least 6 month uncomplicated trabeculectomy measurement repeat .
DOC.criteria: Glaucoma patient need IOPreduction despite maximally tolerate therapy assign trabeculectomy . Minimum 18 year . Corneal pathology .
